price: ደግ ነገርን ብትገልጹ ወይም ብትደብቁት ወይም ከመጥፎ ነገር (ከበደል) ይቅርታ ብታደርጉ አላህ ይቅር ባይ ኃያል ነው፡፡
arabic: إِن تُبۡدُواْ خَيۡرًا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ أَوۡ تَعۡفُواْ عَن سُوٓءٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَفُوّٗا قَدِيرًا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in tub'dū khayran aw tukh'fūhu aw taʿfū ʿan sūin fa-inna al-laha kāna ʿafuwwan qadīran
